named-query.name: User.findUserByLogin
named-query.query: select u from User u where u.login = ?1

named-query.name: User.findAllByTrip
named-query.query: select s.user from Seat s where s.trip.id = ?1

named-query.name: User.findAllAplicantsByTrip
named-query.query: select u from User u join u.aplicaciones a where a.id = ?1 group by u

named-query.name: Trip.findById
named-query.query: select t from Trip t where t.id = ?1

named-query.name: Trip.findByPromoterIdAndArrivalDate
named-query.query: select t from Trip t where t.promoter.id = ?1 and t.arrivalDate = ?2

named-query.name: Trip.findAllStatus
named-query.query: select t from Trip t where t.status = ?1

named-query.name: Trip.findAllTripByPromoterId
named-query.query: select t from Trip t where t.promoter.id = ?1

named-query.name: Seat.findByUserAndTrip
named-query.query: select s from Seat s where s.user.id = ?1 and s.trip.id =?2

named-query.name: Seat.findByUser
named-query.query: select s from Seat s where s.user.id = ?1

named-query.name: Rating.findByAboutFrom
named-query.query: select r from Rating r where r.aboutSeat.user.id = ?1 and r.aboutSeat.trip.id =?2

named-query.name: Rating.findRatingsByUserAboutId
named-query.query: select r from Rating r where r.aboutSeat.user.id = ?1
